runners.runner: envs=$(for param in $task_params; do echo -n "-e $param "; done) echo -n "$envs" echo $workingDirectory docker run --rm -u $(id -u $(whoami)) $envs -v ${workingDirectory}:${workingDirectory} r-base R -e "$(echo "$task_code" | tr -d '\t')"

envs=$(for param in $task_params; do echo -n "-e $param "; done) echo -n "$envs" echo $workingDirectory docker run --rm -u $(id -u $(whoami)) $envs -v ${workingDirectory}:${workingDirectory} singgroup/r-dreimt R -e "$(echo "$task_code" | tr -d '\t' | tr '\n' ' ')"
